ygData.subject: RE: Level 43 song - Desperate Dirge
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think he was referring to area effect damage spells.  Dunno the answer. -- John H. Kim kim@stormhaven.org
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 26 Oct 1999, jay schultze wrote:
> >I haven't played any other class except a bard so I'm not familiar with all
> >the spells out there. Do other classes have spells that can accidently
> >cause damage to them like the Dirge can for bards?
>
> hehe, yep - any class that has a spell requiring targetting can normally
> target himself and cast the spell to "test" it out, or in the case of many
> ppl, they forget to retarget a mob and accidentally cast on themselves (I

I think he was referring to area effect damage spells. Dunno
the answer.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
